body.content:
Respectful,

Please I need your sincere assistance in investing my inheritance fund
in your country, First and foremost, let me tell you more about me, I
am Miss. Myriam Abraham from South Africa, 19 years old and the only
Daughter of my late parents Mr. David Abraham.

My Father was a highly reputable business magnate-( a cocoa merchant )
who operated in the capital of France during his days it is sad to say
that he passed away mysteriously in France during one of his business
trips year 15th .Feb. 2019 .Though his sudden death was linked or
rather suspected to have been masterminded by an uncle of his who
travelled with him at that time, But God Almighty knows the truth!

My mother died when I was just 2 years old, and since then my father
took me so special. Before his death on February 15th been 2019 he
called the secretary who accompanied him to the hospital and told him
that he had a sum of €15 Million Euros that deposited in one of local
bank here in Ivory Coast.

He also said that he used my Name to Deposit the Fund as the next of
kin in this Bank as his only Daughter, He also explained to me that it
was because of this wealth that he was poisoned by his business
associates, That I should seek for a foreign partner in a Country of
my choice where I will transfer this money to and use it for
investment purposes, sincerely, The death of my father actually
brought sorrow to my life.

Now please permit me to ask you these few questions:-
1   Can you honestly help me as your Daughter or your Wife?
2   Can I completely trust you?
3   I need God fearing person that I will says till end of my life.

I am waiting to hear your good news
Yours Sincerely Daughter
Miss. Myriam Abraham.
